paper_title: Asymptototic Expected Utility of Dividend Payments in a Classical Collective Risk Process
abstract: We find the asymptotics of the value function maximizing the expected utility of discounted dividend payments of an insurance company whose reserves are modeled as a classical Cram√©r risk process, with exponentially distributed claims, when the initial reserves tend to infinity. We focus on the power and logarithmic utility functions. We perform some numerical analysis as well.
